titles.title: Protecting Against Foreign Adversary Investments Act of 2024
Protecting Against Foreign Adversary Investments Act of 2024
To amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to better address certain transactions by foreign entities of concern, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, Energy and Commerce, and Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
